author: ajaquith
msg: Slightly changed how EditActionBean.edit() works. It now forwards directly to the editor JSPs. These JSPs now render EditorLayout.jsp, which allows each editor to load its own resources (per mailing list discussion). Edit.jsp's contents essentially morph into EditorLayout.jsp.

author: ajaquith
msg: Fixed bug that popped up in Preferences.jsp regarding skin listings.

author: ajaquith
msg: Added missing hooks for request init/complete lifecycle activities.

author: ajaquith
msg: Fixed bug that caused ReferenceManager tests to fail.
